trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control creates a link for the client browser to navigate to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件创建客户端浏览器导航到另一个 Web 页的链接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: HyperLinkDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件在设计时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>到关联的控件的更改时调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件或一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>设计图面上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法生成关联的设计时标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The method first saves local copies of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> child collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先保存的本地副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>属性，以及<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>子集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: It provides default values for these properties if the original values are `null` or blank.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了默认值为这些属性的原始值是否`null`或空白。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup and restores the properties and child control collection to their original values, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>基方法来生成标记并将属性和子控件集合恢复为其原始值，如有必要。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the associated hyperlink control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于在设计时呈现关联的超链接控件的标记的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 当关联控件的更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 方法调用时<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>关联的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>引发控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>对象，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>基方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据的对象。
